source.sqlReaderQuery:
select top 100
        'Smart HOSL' as BASE
        ,EMP_CGC as CNPJ
        ,gcc_descr as MARCA
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO --duvida
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIFICACAO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (smm_osm_serie = osm_serie and smm_osm = osm_num)
        inner join str str_osm on (str_osm.str_cod = osm_str)
        inner join str str_emp on (str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod)
        inner join pac on (pac_reg = osm_pac)inner join cnv on (cnv_cod = osm_cnv)
        inner join psv psv_exe on (psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join psv psv_req on (psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med)
        inner join smk on (smk_cod = smm_cod and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod)
        inner join gcc on (str_emp.str_cod = gcc_cod)
        
        inner join emp ON (emp_cod = str_emp.str_emp_cod)

        inner join ctf on (ctf_cod = smk_ctf and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo)
        left outer join tab on (tab_cod = smm_tab_cod)
    where 
        1 = 1
        and convert(varchar(10), osm_dthr, 103) = convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 103)

select cnv_cod, cnv.cnv_nome, gcc.gcc_cod, emp.emp_cgc
from cnv,
     gcc,
     str,
     emp
where gcc.gcc_str_cod = str_cod
and str_emp_cod = emp_cod
and emp_cgc <> '-'
and cnv_cod <> '999'
and cnv_stat = 'A'
order by 2
